clubHero.title: Collect your heritage, build your history
clubHero.text: Share, preserve and study rare historical artifacts. Join the collecting community through exhibitions, articles and discussions.

create-discussion__input-placeholder: How to check the authenticity of an item?
create-discussion__error-text: To insert a link, select the word and click the icon
shopping-cart__cta-info-text: You need specify a query and additional text to create a discussion.
create-exhibition__input-placeholder: Early works of Taras Grigorovich Shevchenko
shopping-cart__cta-info-text2: You must specify a topic and additional text to submit an exhibition.
create-exhibition-info__content-text: We provide an opportunity for organizers and artists to present their exhibitions on the platform for advertising or under other conditions. This is a great opportunity to attract new visitors and expand the audience.
create-exhibition-info__conditions-block: You can place materials and a description of the exhibition with important information for users (location, date, time, ticket prices, etc.). Free or paid placement is possible.
Professional assistance in organizing and designing the exhibition.
create-exhibition-info__content-text2: To apply for exhibition placement, click on the button  "Add an exhibition."
create-exhibition-info__content-text3:
Some topics (for example, military projects dedicated to Ukraine and others) can be placed for free or on flexible terms of cooperation.
Send us information about your exhibition, and we will contact you to clarify the terms of cooperation and placement on the platform.
discussion-rules__helper: Click on a section to view details.
discussion-rules__bottom-text: These rules are designed to create a comfortable space for communication and sharing of experiences in the "DIKO" platform community.
file-input__text-1: to upload or drag a file
file-input__text-2: We support PNG, JPEG and GIF up to 10MB
exp-questions__button2: Can I sell through the platform?
modal-ending__end-message-text3: The message will be sent to the dialog
shopping-cart__no-content-text: Find interesting products in the section
shopping-cart__end-subtitle: Wait for the order status to change
shopping-cart__cta-info-text3: You must fill in all sections to confirm the order.
shopping-cart__order-block-receiving-not: Cash on delivery service is paid separately,
shopping-cart__order-block-error5: Please enter the apartment number or put “-”
shopping-cart__order-block-error9: Please enter your middle name or put “-”
shopping-cart__order-block-storage-sched:
Lunch break: 13:00 - 14:00
The schedule may change on holidays.
shopping-cart__order-block-radio-dropdow: Payment upon receipt of goods (card / cash)
Transfer to the company's card account
shopping-cart__order-block-payments-info: Transfer is available in SEPA/SWIFT formats from any bank.
shopping-cart__order-block-payments-uplo:
To confirm the payment, please attach a screenshot of the receipt.
This will help us start processing the order faster — without waiting for confirmation from the bank.
shopping-cart__order-block-payments-erro: Please add at least one file
shopping-cart__order-block-receiving-not: Cash payment is made upon pickup from the warehouse
shopping-cart__order-conclusion-terms-bl: Receipt of an order from 5,000 ₴ - 30,000 ₴ upon receipt of documents. When paying in cash from 30,000 ₴, it is necessary to provide documents for verification in accordance with the requirements of the Law of Ukraine from 06.12.2019 №361-IX
By confirming the order, I accept the terms:
provisions on the processing and protection of personal data
shopping-cart__end-message-text: Track your order in your account in the section
other-items-slider-title: You may also be interested in
no-content__block-top-title: The DIKO team is already working on this article
no-content__block-bottom: Soon, exciting articles about antiques, their history and unique finds will appear here. We are preparing the most interesting things for you, so stay tuned!
items__main-text-no-items: No results for the selected filters.
no-content__block-top-title2: The DIKO team is already working on this exhibition
no-content__block-bottom2: If you have an interesting idea or a ready-made exhibition, we will be happy to present it here! We invite you to share your proposal - our team will be happy to consider it and support the implementation of your project.
howtoexperise__h2: How to get a professional appraisal of your item?
howtoexperise__assesment-text8: Now I can pay for the service and get the result.
item-evaluation__h2: Select the required item evaluation option:
card__price-text: Estimate: 400 UAH. + 2% of the item value
card__price-text2: Simple expertise: 2000 UAH + 2% of the estimated value.
card__h4: What the owner of the lot will receive:
card__item2: Estimate (what condition the item is in) and approximate value.
card__item5:
A certificate recognized by the professional community.
International certificate.
pagehelper__item: If you are only interested in the cost —
pagehelper__item3: For sale, insurance or authentication — suitable
pagehelper__item4: a detailed estimate and certification of authenticity.
pagehelper__text: This will not only provide you with the necessary information, but also allow you to use your budget as efficiently as possible.
photos-helper__h3: Photos should be clear and of good quality.
photos-helper__item: Take photos from different angles. Show the item from the front, back, sides, and top and bottom.
photos-helper__item2: Take detailed photos of all the features. If there are defects (scratches, cracks, scuffs) - take separate photos.
photos-helper__item3: Good lighting will help to convey all the details. Use natural light or soft artificial lighting without harsh shadows.
photos-helper__text: This will help the expert assess the item more accurately!
no-content__block-top-title3: It looks like we lost this page...
no-content__block-bottom3: Either it ran away in an unknown direction, or it was never here. Don't worry, you can always go back to the main page and find something interesting!
